local_intent: Approach and align to the T-block within 5 mm tolerance, verifying the approach pose.
assumptions: t_block pose is reachable and unobstructed
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT approach step using DetectObject(t_block) then ApproachAndAlign(t_block, 0.005, 1200) with a retry, followed by a pose verification.
